eventSummary:
A bank insider allegedly forged names and created fake withdrawal slips, leading to the draining of $75,000 from eight customer accounts. Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/23066179/Bank-Insider-Reportedly-Forges-Names-and-Fills-Out-Fake-Withdrawal-Slips-Drains-75000-From-Accounts-of-Eight-Customers

A billion-dollar bank is reportedly compensating a data breach victim after a cybersecurity incident exposed personal and financial information, including names, social security numbers, and account details. Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/23063970/Billion-Dollar-Bank-Handing-Thousands-of-Dollars-To-Data-Breach-Victim-After-Cybersecurity-Incident-Exposed-Names-Social-Security-Numbers-Account-Details

Ingram Micro experienced an outage attributed to a SafePay ransomware attack. The attack was reported by Lawrence Abrams. Sources:
- https://twitter.com/50026664/status/1941527257182306730
